code:
sequenceDiagram
    Actor User
    Participant Runner
    Participant GoogleMaps
    Participant APIService
    Participant CSVFile
    User ->> Runner : Requests report
    Runner ->> Runner : Creates GoogleMap object
    Runner ->> GoogleMaps : Calls the save_to_csv method
    GoogleMaps ->> GoogleMaps : Calls get_pollen_info(FinTech_TransactionQueue)/get_air_quality_info(FinTech_AuthVault) methods
    GoogleMaps ->> GoogleMaps : Calls get_forecast_pollen(FinTech_TransactionQueue)/get_current_conditions_quality(FinTech_AuthVault)
    GoogleMaps ->> APIService : Makes a HTTPS request to the Google Maps API
    APIService ->> GoogleMaps : Returns a JSON with air quality or pollen information
    GoogleMaps ->> GoogleMaps : Returns the JSON
    GoogleMaps ->> CSVFile : Saves specified location to the CSV file
    GoogleMaps ->> Runner : Returns data saved to the file
repo_description: Application made in a team for UNH for checking allergen and air quality in a specific region in NH, copied to personal repo after class to keep
